list-item.p: The article shed new light about the surprise effect of COVID 19.
The surprise lies in the co-action of two different agents.
These agents are the evolved new properties of SARS-CoV2 and too much physical connectivity.
The pointed-out co-action was catastrophic revealing the fragility of our institutions and globalized socioeconomic system.
New research avenues are proposed related to the concept of K-vaves.
